title: FIX THE CLIENT
body:
Ill make it simple

RIOT NEEDS TO REDO THEIR CLIENT

mine screws up all the time and its bloody annoying

With one of my friends, it didn't mention when directx9 wasn't installed (he was using a new comp). when he started a game, it just wouldn't work. he was afk for the game 'cause he didn't know had had to fix it.

Whenever I restart my computer, it spends an hour just rescanning the files to only say that there is no update.

Just now, I entered a ranked game. it wouldn't work. I shut league and re-opened the client. apparently some files were corrupt and it is re-patching. BUT I DIDNT KNOW.  THE GAME DIDNT TELL BE BEFORE I ENTERED THE GAME
now I'm gonna lose lp, and have 5 x 20 min leavebusters for something that was NOT MY FAULT.
How is this fair?

I'm not the only one who thinks this client is crap, at least amongst others I've talked with.

Can RIOT PLZ replace the client with something better that doesn't fk up like this and screw me over.

replies.body: dude i feel you aye my game crashed in champion select for ranked today then had to update now im sitting in a 20 min queue due to riots un stable client

Hey there,

That's really odd that your client is insisting there is corrupt files every time you relaunch the game, perhaps something more sinister is happening here.

How old is the computer?
Have you noticed any other applications behaving strangely?

Luckily for you, a [new client in currently in the works. ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/na/site/2016-season-update/client-update.html)

In the meantime, feel free to browse the [common fixes](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/MOopB6Wt-experiencing-a-tech-problem-find-the-common-fixes-here) to see if any of them help the issue you are currently experiencing.
